mapper.insert: insert into goods(id, name, img, descr, specials, price, discount, unit, stock, goods.category_id) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{img}, #{descr}, #{specials}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{unit}, #{stock}, #{category_id})
mapper.update: update goods set name = #{name}, img = #{img}, descr = #{descr}, specials = #{specials}, price = #{price}, discount = #{discount}, unit = #{unit}, stock = #{stock}, category_id = #{category_id} where id = #{id}
